contact.title: Comment
contact.ideaSuggest: Submit your ideas and / or comments to us. We will be happy to read you and improve Fouly!
contact.commentPlaceHolder: Enter your comments, suggestions or ideas.
contact.findUsSocial: You can find us on social networks. It will be our pleasure to stay connected with you!

delay.title: Is the waiting line moving forward ...

number.title: How many people are there in front of you ?

myFavorites.title: My favorites
myFavorites.instruction: You will find important details in the blink of an eye such as the waiting time and the traffic in your favorite businesses. To add a favorite, go to the map, select a business and click on the star.

owner.title: Owners and managers
owner.content: Avec les nouvelles règles de distanciation sociale à mettre en place, les écueils rencontrés par les commerçants dans les mois à venir seront nombreux et à différents niveaux. Ces nouvelles règles imposent souvent des changements importants au niveau organisationnel pour les commerçants, en plus d’ajouter des contraintes à la clientèle, ce qui est toujours un défi à relever. Un de ces défis consiste à permettre à la clientèle d’être servie sans attente, de manière sécuritaire en respectant les règles de distanciation.

measures.title: Distanciation measures
measures.content:
• Maintain a distance of at least 2 meters with other customers and staff
  • Wash hands before entering the store (or follow employee instructions)
  • Follow the instructions at checkout to pay for your items
  • Do not go to the store if you have symptoms
  • Limit handling of items as much as possible
  • Pay by credit or debit card
measures.na: This functionality will be available soon. Thanks for your interest in Fouly!
